title: La Gallina Verde
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Ovo, Organic, Take-out, Fusion, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Organic restaurant, mostly vegetarian with a couple chicken dishes. Features chapatas, tartas, vegan sandwiches, and bean/sweet potato burgers. Also a health food store selling organic and fair trade products.
streetAddress: Plaza Dorada, Local 11, Av. Manufactura 8, Col. √Ålamos 3a
